pages.text: In able to play Buddycards, you will need a pair of built decks (see Deckbuilding) and a pair of playmats. Playmats are easy to make. Place them across from eachother, then place your deckbox on your playmat. Once both players do this, the game will start.

At the start of the game, each player draws two cards. After this, a player is chosen at random to go first, drawing a card at the start of their turn, which both players do at the start of each turn.
